events.message: I recently purchased a pair of headphones but they do not work at all. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The complaint about refusing to use the product and requesting money back was categorized under Refund.
The case was assigned to the customer service agent responsible for refund requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want a refund for your headphones. I'd be happy to assist.
Could you please provide your order number and the date of purchase so I can check the return eligibility and process your refund?
Sure, the order number is 1234567890 and I bought the headphones about two weeks ago.
Thank you for the information. We have approved your refund request. Please send the headphones back using the prepaid return label attached to the email.
Thanks for the quick response and easy instructions. I will send the headphones back today.
We have received the returned product and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the transaction to complete.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the refund has been successfully processed and confirmed by the customer, the case is now closed. Thank you for your patience!
